p: Interestingly, Boutebouhart et al. [ 55] compared the antioxidant activity of S. officinalis leaves EO cultivated in Algeria and obtained by microwave-assisted hydrodistillation, conventional hydrodistillation technique, and steam distillation. The EOs obtained by steam distillation and hydrodistillation presented the highest percentage of DPPH radical inhibition with values of 40.25% and 36.75%, respectively, (at 1000 mg/L).
